settings.heading: Nothing Store Soho
settings.lead_paragraph: A wonderfully Nothing encounter. Right in the heart of London’s cultural district. Visit Nothing Store Soho for a unique way to experience our entire product range.

settings.heading: Nothing Store Soho
settings.lead_graph:
Our first ever retail space is nearly ready. A physical expression of everything we stand for.

See you soon, London.

settings.heading: Ear (stick) #the100 drop
settings.lead_graph:
Our most advanced audio product yet. Limited edition. 

An opening weekend exclusive. Join us on Saturday 10 December for a chance to buy one of the limited edition #the100 Ear (stick). Exclusively available at Nothing Store Soho. While stocks last. With free exclusive branded merch. And opportunities to win Nothing products.

It’s going to be fun.

settings.heading: Find us
settings.lead_paragraph:
Address: 4 Peter Street, Soho, London, W1F 0AD

Opening hours:

Mon - Sat: 10:00 - 19:00

Sun: 12:00 - 18:00

Contact us: sohostore@nothing.tech

settings.heading: Shipping.
settings.lead_graph:
We offer free delivery on all orders.

Standard shipping: 3-5 working days (within 1 week).

settings.heading: Payment.
settings.lead_graph:
We accept most major credit and debit cards including Visa, MasterCard, American Express, as well as PayPal.

Add a product to cart and fill in the information at checkout to display all options available to your location.

settings.heading: Support Centre
settings.lead_graph:
Each earbud features a composite mesh design for improved sweat and water resistance with an IPX4 rating.

( Learn More )

settings.question: What do you sell at the Store?
settings.answer: All Nothing devices are available for purchase, including accessories and spare parts like ear tips. There will also be official Nothing merch.

settings.question: Is there parking at the Store?
settings.answer: There is no street parking at Peter Street. However, there is street parking available at nearby Wardour Street, a 1 minute walk away.

settings.question: What’s the nearest Tube station?
settings.answer: We’re approximately a 5-7 minute walk from Leicester Square and Piccadilly Circus, and a 9 minute walk from Oxford Circus and Tottenham Court Road.

settings.question: What’s the return and exchange policy?
settings.answer: We currently only offer in-store refunds and exchanges for items purchased at Nothing Store Soho. We do not accept returns for any items purchased online. We do offer in-store exchanges.

settings.question: Can I reserve items online and collect them in-store?
settings.answer: No, we currently don’t offer a service to reserve online.

settings.question: Are tech support services available?
settings.answer: No, the Store does not offer any technical support or customer support services, including after-care and product repairs. For any enquires about or issues with your Nothing device, please contact customer support or visit our Support Centre.

settings.question: What payments do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept all major credit cards. We do not accept cash.

settings.question: Can I bring my dog into the Store?
Can I use my coupon in-store?
settings.answer: For now, we will not be accepting coupons issued online.
